title: 04/01/22 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 04/01/22 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Mike Florio about Bruce Arians calling him out in a press conference yesterday. Rex Chapman calls in to preview the Final Four as well as talks about people that chirp him on twitter. Randy Johnson offers up his house for a whole week while we're in Arizona for Super Bowl next year. And Bubba Watson shares the story of playing with Tiger for the first time

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
